Sign-In.disclaimer: Ne èdi be yeage ɖe eme la, ŋlɔ wò telefon xexlẽdzesi si dze egɔme tso dukɔ ƒe xexlẽdzesi 228 dzi, emegbe nàlé ŋku ɖe gbedasi aɖe tso Impact Stream (Sandbox) gbɔ ŋu eye nàŋlɔ wò kɔdasia ɖe pop-up la me.

Onboarding.heading: Kpe Wò Nyatakakawo Ɖo
Onboarding.disclaimer: Womagblɔ wò nyatakakawo na dukɔa o eye ɖeko woazã wo atsɔ ade dzesi wò eye woate ŋu aƒo ka na wò ne ehiã.

Proposals.heading: Kpekpeɖeŋunaɖoɖo Siwo Wodo Ɖa
Proposals.nullMessage: Fifia la, aɖaŋuɖoɖo aɖeke meli o alo kuxi aɖe le miaƒe kadodoa ŋu.

Create Proposal.title: Tanya
Create Proposal.locationValidationMessage: Taflatse gblɔ afisi woawɔ dɔa le.
Create Proposal.collaboratorsContext: Ne èle dɔ wɔm aduadu kple ame bubuwo le dɔbiagbalẽvi sia dzi be nàwɔ aɖaŋuɖoɖo sia la, di wo eye nàtsɔ wo akpe ɖe eŋu le afisia.
Create Proposal.grantInformationContext: Taflatse na nyatakaka agbɔsɔsɔme si le asiwò. Ðee fia be wobu wò dɔa ŋu nyuie
Create Proposal.locationsAffectedValidationMessage: Taflatse migblɔ teƒe siwo wògblẽ nu le.
Create Proposal.communityProblemPlaceholder: Nutoa Me Ƒe Kuxi Si Gbɔ Woakpɔ
Create Proposal.communityProblemContext: Gblɔ nya kpui aɖe eye nàde akɔntabubuwo eme ne ehiã be nàtsɔ aɖee afia be kuxi sia gblẽa nu le nutoa me tɔwo ŋu
Create Proposal.proposedSolutionContext: Gblɔ nusi nèɖo be yeawɔ tso kuxia ŋu na mí eye nàɖo kpe edzi be wò egbɔkpɔnua awɔ dɔ.
Create Proposal.proposedSolutionValidationMessage: taflatse mitsɔ egbɔkpɔnu si wodo ɖa
Create Proposal.sustainabilityPlaceholder: Ðe esia ate ŋu anɔ anyi ɖaa? Fia alesi nàwɔe.
Create Proposal.sustainabilityValidationMessage: Taflatse mitsɔ kpeɖodzi siwo ɖee fia be woate ŋu anɔ anyi ɖaa.
Create Proposal.sustainabilityContext: Dɔ nyuitɔwo kekeakee nye esiwo Togotɔwo ate ŋu ayi edzi. Míedi be míakpɔ dɔ siwo wotu be woanɔ anyi dzidzimewo.
Create Proposal.minimumBudgetContext: Ga home si le F.CFA me (menye USD alo bubu aɖeke o), si mewu 12,000,000 F.CFA o.
Create Proposal.minimumBudgetMax: Asixɔxɔ si sɔ gbɔ wue nye 12,000,000 F.CFA
Create Proposal.keyPlayersPlaceholder: Amewo Kple Nudzrala Siwo Kpɔa Eme
Create Proposal.keyPlayersValidationMessage: Taflatse mina amewo kple nudzrala siwo kpɔ gome le eme.
Create Proposal.timelineValidationMessage: Taflatse gblɔ ɣeyiɣi si woatsɔ awɔ dɔe.
Create Proposal.addMilestoneButton: Tsɔ Nu Vevi Aɖe Kpe Ɖe Eŋu
Create Proposal.milestoneContext: Ma wò ɖoɖoa me ɖe afɔɖeɖewo me. Fia nusi afɔɖeɖe ɖesiaɖe si míaɖe le mɔa dzi abia mí.

Proposal Details.heading: Gakpekpeɖeŋunana Siwo Wodo Ŋu
Proposal Details.locationsAffected: Teƒe Siwo Ŋu Wògblẽa Nu Le

Donate.heading: Na nu
Donate.disclaimer: Ne crypto gakotoku mele asiwò o la,
Donate.link: dzɔ nu le kadodo sia dzi.

Footer.message: Wokeke akɔdada ƒe akpaa ɖe enu va ɖo October ƒe domedome. Ɣletiŋkeke si tututu woaɖe gbeƒãe.

Nye Tasiaɖam.nullMessage: Nu aɖeke mele wò kekea me fifia o.

Adzɔxexe.disclaimer: Taflatse lé ŋku ɖe wò kekea ŋu eye nàɖo kpe wò nudzɔdzɔa dzi.

Nye Nunanawo.nullMessage: Fifia la, kpekpeɖeŋunana aɖeke meli o alo kuxi aɖe le wò kadodoa ŋu.

Nye Akɔdadawo.nullMessage: Fifia la, akɔdada aɖeke meli o alo kuxi aɖe le wò kadodoa ŋu.
